question_text: Your class is planning a fundraiser. What role would you prefer?
scenario: The school needs to raise money for new equipment. Your class is organizing a big fundraising event with different teams handling various aspects.

options.text: Building and setting up the booths and decorations
Creating posters and designing the event theme
Calculating costs and managing the budget
Greeting visitors and explaining the cause

question_text: You're working on a group science project. What part interests you most?
scenario: Your group needs to create a presentation about renewable energy for the science fair.

options.text: Building a working model of a solar panel or windmill
Researching and analyzing different energy sources
Presenting the findings to judges and visitors
